Contact.description: Information about the contact associated with the invoice.

Date.description: The date when the invoice was created.

DueDate.description: The due date by which the payment for the invoice is expected.

LineAmountTypes.description: Details about the line amount types in the invoice.

LineItems.description: List of line items included in the invoice.

SubTotal.description: The subtotal amount for the invoice.

TotalTax.description: The total tax amount included in the invoice.

Total.description: The total amount including taxes and discounts for the invoice.

TotalDiscount.description: The total discount amount applied to the invoice.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The date and time when the invoice was last updated.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for the invoice.

CurrencyRate.description: The currency exchange rate applied to the invoice.

InvoiceID.description: The unique identifier of the invoice.

Reference.description: Any reference information associated with the invoice.

BrandingThemeID.description: The unique identifier of the branding theme associated with the invoice.

Url.description: The URL link to access the invoice.

SentToContact.description: Indicates if the invoice has been sent to the contact.

ExpectedPaymentDate.description: The expected payment date for the invoice.

ExpectedPaymentDateString.description: The expected payment date for the invoice in string format.

PlannedPaymentDate.description: The planned payment date for the invoice.

PlannedPaymentDateString.description: The planned payment date for the invoice in string format.

HasAttachments.description: Indicates if the invoice has attachments.

Payments.description: List of payments associated with the invoice.

CreditNotes.description: List of credit notes related to the invoice.

Prepayments.description: List of prepayments made for the invoice.

Overpayments.description: List of overpayments if any on the invoice.

AmountDue.description: The amount still due to be paid for the invoice.

AmountPaid.description: The amount already paid for the invoice.

FullyPaidOnDate.description: The date on which the invoice was fully paid.

AmountCredited.description: The amount credited for the invoice.

DueDateString.description: The due date in string format by which the payment for the invoice is expected.

IsDiscounted.description: Indicates if the invoice is discounted.

HasErrors.description: Indicates if there are errors associated with the invoice.

DateString.description: The date when the invoice was created in string format.
